title: Investor's Guide: Investment rules for NRIs
text: Investor's Guide: Investment rules for NRIs 09 Aug 2015, 9:18AM IST Copy URL Embed Find out how Non-Resident Indians and those planning to move out of the country for some time should plan their investments so that their returns are least-affected due to tax implications. Dhirendra Kumar, CEO, Value Research, says that such individuals should not book short term capital gains, as these attract TDS. They should also avoid investing in dividend option of MFs.
